rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Grand foyer with a reception area aligned to the auspicious east. Minimalistic yet elegant Bohemian decor, featuring ambient lighting and natural textures.

vastu.notes: Entrance facing east is considered auspicious for wealth and prosperity.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with an open layout designed for social gatherings. Bohemian style accents, natural materials, and a blend of indoor-outdoor elements.

vastu.notes: Placement ensures good circulation of energy.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Cozy dining space adjacent to the living room with a Bohemian flair, featuring handcrafted furniture and local artisan decor.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet rustic kitchen design with ample storage. Incorporates Vastu-aligned placement of the stove in the south-east corner.

vastu.notes: Placing stove in south-east enhances positive energy.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace with a quiet ambience, natural lighting, and ergonomic design. Features a wall-mounted desk facing north for concentration.

vastu.notes: Office placed in the north ensures clarity of thought.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Luxurious home theater designed with soundproofing and ambient lighting. Bohemian design elements are used to create an intimate cinematic experience.

vastu.notes: Positioned to avoid energy clashes and enhance entertainment vibe.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom with a private balcony. Decorated in a Bohemian style with colorful textiles and local handicrafts.

vastu.notes: Balcony oriented east enhances the room's energy.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large, inviting door with intricate Bohemian detailing, ensuring seamless transition from outdoors to indoors.

openings.name: Living Room Windows
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows with sheer curtains for natural light and ventilation.

openings.name: Kitchen Ventilation
openings.description: A strategically placed window to allow fresh air, positioned according to Vastu guidelines in the south-east corner.

notes: The design adheres to local building norms and incorporates Vastu principles where appropriate. The triplex structure is intended for a luxury segment with a Bohemian aesthetic, ensuring comfort and energy balance.
